item.description: During our second year, I designed and implemented my own Archetype-based ECS in my own game engine.

item.title: Electrical Designer
item.description:
Job Description / Responsibilities

Designed drawings and technical solutions for offices, apartment buildings, schools, and laboratories within electrical installations, telecom and data systems, and lighting.

Created 3D models for the construction of prefabricated slab elements. Analyzed project requirements and specifications and developed a technical/economic plan based on these requirements.

item.title: Project Manager
item.description:
Job Description / Responsibilities

Planned and structured the implementation of selected products based on the project’s specific framework and budget. Executed electrical projects from start to finish.
Created and managed schedules, communicated with clients and other stakeholders, managed budgets and resources, and ensured that the project met all technical requirements and regulations.

item.title: Cooking Grandma
item.description: Multiple award winning Game jam during my first year at The Game Assembly

item.title: Game Project 7
item.description:
Sample blog content. Like a lorem ipsum but saying something more interesting.

Welcome to the world of “Content Ipsum,” the fresh alternative to the classic lorem ipsum. It’s the perfect blend for designers and writers who crave a dash of creativity and meaning in their placeholder text. Imagine a text that not only fills the space but also sparks the imagination, a text that weaves tales of innovation, inspiration, and the endless possibilities that creativity brings.

item.title: Cooking Grandma
item.description:
You play as a Chef who is running a diner in a busy part of town, the chef is serving a most unusual customer.

The Diner
Welcoming the first customer!

A student led Game Jam of 5 students

Programmers:

William Arnberg
Gustaf Engsner
Emrik Ã…berg Wenthzel

Procedural Artists:

Carl Andersson
Hampus Helin

item.title: Lead Installer
item.description:
Job Description / Responsibilities

Planned tasks, allocated resources, and ensured that the work was completed on time and within budget.
Responsibilities included training new team members and providing coaching and feedback to help them develop.

item.title: Electrician
item.description:
Job Description / Responsibilities

Installed, repaired, and maintained electrical systems and equipment, including lighting, power supply, communication systems, and other related technologies.
